item.title: CloudSEK Secures $10M Series B2
item.description: CloudSEK, a Bengaluru, India, and New Haven, Conn.-based predictive cyber threat intelligence firm specializing in AI-powered attack detection, has secured a $10 million Series B2 investment. Investors The round was led by Connecticut Innovations, with previous participation from Commvault, MassMutual Ventures, Inflexor Ventures, Prana Ventures, and Tenacity Ventures. item.title: GovDash Raises $30 Million Series B
item.description: GovDash, a New York-based AI-powered capture, proposal, and contract management platform, has raised $30 million in Series B funding. Investors The round was led by Mucker Capital and British Columbia Investment Management Corporation (BCI), with participation from existing investors Northzone and Y Combinator. item.title: Aikido Security Raises $60M Series B at $1B Valuation
item.description: Aikido Security, a Brussels, Belgium–based cybersecurity company, has raised $60 million in a Series B round at a $1 billion valuation. Investors The round was led by DST Global, with participation from PSG Equity. DST Global is a growth-equity investment firm specializing in late-stage, high-growth internet and technology companies. item.title: Defense Unicorns Secures $136M Series B
item.description: Defense Unicorns, a San Antonio, Texas–based defense technology company, has raised $136 million in a Series B funding round at a valuation exceeding $1 billion. item.description: MontyCloud, a Seattle, WA–based autonomous cloud operations company, has raised a Series B funding round.
